Good game so far but so many cheaters its hard to play, overall i think that it can be subsided if you have a prime account. However its hard to tell whether or not valve have thought this one through as you can still get cheaters in most games you play. which is demoralising as if you spend money on the game you get the same treatment as those who are cheaters.
